profile:
5 Star Cleaning provides professional and licensed Water Damage Restoration Services for all of Toronto & GTA. Our team responds to projects 24/7 for immediate Water Damage Remediation to prevent secondary damage to your home! Our team is experienced, licensed, and fully equipped to deal with Water Damage issues in Homes, Condos, basements, and Commercial properties. Call us now for free phone consultation for your Water Damage Service need. Big or Small, we do them all! 416-315-7562

5 Star Cleaning Team also provides POST RENOVATION CLEANING SERVICES, MOVE IN/MOVE OUT CLEANING SERVICES, AND REGULAR HOUSE CLEANING SERVICES. Our in-house cleaning team is dedicated to providing DEEP CLEANING services around your priorities and goals for the cleaning services. Everything in the house is included in our cleaning packages, and we provide all equipment and supplies for professional house cleaning projects. Call us today for free phone consultation for all of your house cleaning needs. 416-315-7562

5 Star Cleaning, provides professional rug and carpet cleaning, Upholstery Cleaning, Scotch Guarding, and Stain Removal Services in both residential and Commercial areas in the GTA and Toronto areas. For booking call, 416 315 7562

Our teams are fully vaccinated and they continue to practice social distancing, Wear masks, contactless payment, and disinfecting at all times.

profile:
Canada's Restoration Services is a leader in the restoration industry with over 12 years of experience. We specialize in mold removal, asbestos testing and removal, water damage restoration, fire and smoke damage and reconstruction.

We operate 24/7 and guarantee to be on site within 45 minutes for all emergencies. We provide same day appointments and have completed over 10,000 inspections and jobs nationwide. We work with every insurance company across Canada to help make the process quicker and easier for you and your family. We also provide free financing for all eligible customers to help ease any burdens.

We are a nationwide company and have been awarded over 13 years running  by HomeStars as Top Restoration Company. We value our customers and work hard to provide professional and reliable services. Call and speak to an expert today! We service Ontario, Quebec, and Alberta!
service_area:
Our Certified Experienced Water Damage Specialists and Mold Inspectors are strategically located throughout the provinces.

This enables Emergency Response within 45 minutes or less.

No time? Emergency? we are located in or serve every major city in Alberta, Ontario, Quebec. Call Now - help is close by!

profile: Mold Detection & Removal If you suspect Mold and want an honest, informative and common sense approach to mold testing, mold inspection and mold removal, you should book an inspection, you won't be disappointed. You and your family deserve to live in a safe and healthy environment. Mold can seriously compromise the structural integrity of your home, and adversely affect your family’s health and well-being. At mri-mold.ca it’s our job to ensure you are provided with an accurate assessment and appropriate resolution to maintain a safe and healthy environment.

profile:
PuroClean Canada is a leader in providing complete services in mold detection & removal.  Our expertise in property damage emergencies, helps families and businesses overcome the devastating setbacks caused by water, fire, mold and other conditions resulting in property loss.

Our understanding and compassion during the recovery process has earned PuroClean the reputation of being known as “The Paramedics of Property Damage™" and a provider of choice for insurance professionals and property owners throughout Canada and the United States.  We pledge to do whatever it takes to respond, restore and rescue properties in all of the communities we serve.
service_area: Ontario & Alberta, BC Lower Mainland, BC Fraser Valley
services:
1. Water Damager Restoration:
 
Our trained professionals identify the full extent of water damage, both obvious and unseen, by using moisture sensors and detectors. This ensures that a thorough remediation and cleanup within the damaged property is always completed, no matter the size of the  water emergency project. 
 
Some examples of the water damage services handled by PuroClean are: Flooded Basements, Sump pump failure, Sewer backup, Cracks in the foundation leading to seepage and many more incidents where water has damaged your home or property. 
 
2. Fire Damage Restoration: 
 
As property owners, we understand how devastating a fire can be, which is why we take the time to walk each owner through every step of the restoration process.
 
Our main goal is to meet the needs of the customer and ensure that their mind is at ease throughout the entire process. We determine the full extent of the fire damage, including the impact of smoke, heat and residues from fire and smoke. 
 
It is essential that we provide open communication with the property owner, ensuring that they are fully aware of what will be taking place in their home following this unexpected loss. 
 
PuroClean is determined in their processes to prevent replacement costs that reduce overall expenditures, saving the property owner money wherever possible. 


3. Mould Inspection and Mitigation:
 
When it comes to a property that has been affected by Mould we use environmentally friendly cleaning agents, a botanical spray and a hydroxyl to ensure that the infected area has been completely sanitized and cleansed. 
 
Through this multifaceted process, mould spores are captured and killed, leaving behind a clean area and fresh scent. Whether your property has been affected by Attic Mould,  Mould in the Kitchen, Basement Mould or any other kind of mould in your home or property the Paramedics of Property Damage are your trusted restoration specialists. 
 
4. Biohazard & Trauma Cleanup: 
 
In your time of need, let our professional technicians take care of you and your family, providing you peace of mind. 
 
Our services will be professionally completed and your space and belongings handled with care. 
 
We offer the following Biohazard clean ups: Blood and Bodily fluid cleanup, Suicide and Homicide Cleanup, Accidental Death Clean up, Sewage Cleanup and Sanitation Services, Rodent and Bird Feces Cleanup Services and Hoarding Cleanup Services.

profile:
Broken pipes, leaking roofs, backed up sewers, sever weather, accidental fires, mold and asbestos all result in unhealthy living and working environments and thousands of dollars in property damage.

At DSG, we are a leading edge disaster restoration company that offers 24Hr emergency service for flood, fire and water damage restoration, mold remediation and asbestos abatement ..  We also offer a full line of general contracting services.

At DSG our trained customer service representatives are available 24HRS a day, 365 days a year to take any call (emergency or otherwise) and rapidly respond to our clients needs by dispatching our IICRC trained staff to ensure a proper mitigation of losses to your personal belongings, property and a minimal of interruption to your business.

We provide service coverage to commercial, residential, multi residential, industry, retail properties as well as to insurance providers and homeowners throughout Toronto and Southern Ontario.  

"Success Through Services and Trust"

profile:
Our job at High Class Renovation is to take your vision and make it a reality. We start by listening to your vision about your project and once we have a clear picture we begin to create the design for your renovation. Our goal is to ensure that everything is to your expectations. When it’s time to start your project, we go to work and complete the renovations just as we discussed, on time and within budget.

High Class Renovation is Barrie and surrounding Area’s leading home renovations service. We have 20 years of experience completing home and commercial renovation projects of all sizes. During that time of making our clients’ renovation visions a reality, we have worked in a variety of settings and installed hundreds of thousands of square feet of ceramic, porcelain and marble tile in custom houses, condos and new subdivisions.
